response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value of $15,000, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision.", "product_price": 14000}
